mpicxx    -Wall -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.11.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/domainGrid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/matrix2D.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/vectorMath.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/timeDomain.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/HDF5dataFile.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/jsoncpp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mhd.dir/burgers2D.cpp.o  -o mhd  -L/Users/angus1/HDF5/hdf5-1.10.0-patch1/hdf5/lib -Wl,-rpath,/Users/angus1/HDF5/hdf5-1.10.0-patch1/hdf5/lib  /opt/local/lib/openmpi-gcc5/libmpi_cxx.dylib /opt/local/lib/openmpi-gcc5/libmpi.dylib -lhdf5 -lhdf5_cpp
